home.name: Brahim Abdelli
home.bio: Software engineer building robust backends with NestJS & Spring Boot, and polished frontends with React & Angular. Every project lands on GitHub for you to fork & explore.

aboutme.name: ABOUT ME
aboutme.bio1: I'm a Software Engineer with a passion for building web solutions. Coding is an activity I exercise every day with passion.
aboutme.bio2: Outside coding and software related topics, I love traveling, playing video games, reading and watching tv shows and competing in sports.
aboutme.bio3: I strive to bring good energy, technical knowledge, and a strong desire to learn with me wherever I go.
aboutme.description1: I have 4+ years of experience designing, developing, testing, and deploying web applications.
aboutme.description2: I focus on Javascript, Typescript, and Java.
aboutme.description3: I also love topics like clean code, optimization, app performance, and SEO.

projects.name: PROJECTS
projects.description: Catch all my public repositories on my GitHub profile.

portfolio.description: This is a personal portfolio I created to showcase my work as a software engineer. I try to keep it updated.

nestier.description: Production-ready NestJS boilerplate supported by the official awesome-nestjs project. Hexagonal architecture, Domain-Driven Design, and Generic Repository Pattern.

autosansrisque.description2: A service marketplace platform for the automotive sector. I developed the MVP including online payment integration.
autosansrisque.description3: This project is backed by BiatLabs incubator.
autosansrisque.description4: Still in development with other developers.

clothingcompany.name: Clothing Company
clothingcompany.description: Developed a website for a clothing company allowing administrators to manage the stock.

adventofcode.description: This repository contains my attempt at solving Advent of Code by annual set.

tekmanda.description: I contributed by adding and implementing some features for this food services platform, my contribution was mainly in the Frontend part.

softeam.descriptionShort: Software Engineer at Softeam since February 2024. I worked on two large scale projects involving complex architectures.
softeam.description: I work at Softeam since February 2024. I develop an online examination management platform (driving theory, motorcycle exams) using hexagonal architecture, DDD, NestJS, Angular, Kafka, and Kubernetes.
softeam.tech: Tech: NestJS, Angular, MySQL, Kafka, TypeORM, Elasticsearch, Kibana, Grafana, Kubernetes, Amazon S3, Jest, Sonar, Jenkins, Openshift.

excellia.description: At Excellia Solutions I built banking and e-KYC platforms: international banking operations.
excellia.tech: Tech: Spring Boot, NestJS, React, Angular, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, ActiveMQ, TypeORM, Docker, Kubernetes.

items.husseinDescription: Deep dives into networking, databases, system design and backend. Clear explanations and real-world scenarios. Structured courses on Udemy too.
items.webdevcodyDescription: Web development tutorials and project walkthroughs. React, Next.js and full-stack content.
items.primeagenDescription: Vim, TypeScript, system design and engineering practices. Straight-talking and highly technical.
